description.displayText: Hired her last minute when my regular Sitter had to go out of town. Not only did she do a wonderful job but my son loves her and we use her more than once a week. I would recommend her, highly.
description.originalText: Hired her last minute when my regular Sitter had to go out of town. Not only did she do a wonderful job but my son loves her and we use her more than once a week. I would recommend her, highly.

description.displayText: I knew Sara since she was only 16 years old. Since that age, she would babysit my son and daughter for me when I had a quick errand. Her father was my landlord and we lived upstairs. There were some days where being a single mother, I had to do certain things where my children couldn't be with me and I had not much help. Sara, despite her going to school, always was willing to give me a helping hand free of charge, just for the goodness of her soul. My kids were a handful  Thank you so much my dear.
description.originalText: I knew Sara since she was only 16 years old. Since that age, she would babysit my son and daughter for me when I had a quick errand. Sara, despite her going to school, always was willing to give me a helping hand free of charge, just for the goodness of her soul. My kids were a handful  Thank you so much my dear.

description.displayText: I've known Sara from the neighborhood I used to live in. Sara is truly a sweet person and has helped me a lot before my daughter started school. She taught my daughters her ABCs and how to write her name when she was three years old! There were days I would call her literally only one hour before when something came up, and if she was around, she would come to me regardless of the short notice. My daughter loved her and was sad when she started going to Pre-K, she knew that she would be seeing Sara a lot less. When my daughter was grouchy, she knew how to cheer her up. Always on time and always a happy person. Choose her guys, you will not regret it!
